title: Horizon eSports looking for players, plat +
body:
Hi am looking to make a plat + serious team. All players should preferably 18+ but if you are mature we can let u in.
I myself will be managing/coaching as I want to play as little as possible because I no longer enjoy playing, but still enjoy the game, as we start out I will be filling roles necessary and when all roles are filled I'll be moving to managing/coaching.

I am looking for this to be an active team playing at a minimum 3 days per week. Also we will be using Team-speak for our voice coms, I plan to try another program out to compare in a couple of weeks time, but for now it will be Team-speak.

Could you please fill out this form if you would like to trial or add me in game and send me the completed form.

Name:
IRL first name:
Age:
State:
Top two roles:
Top 4 champions in each of those roles:
Rank:
Availability:

Good luck and will be looking forward to hearing from you soon.
~zPONYv~
